Title: Nannaku Prematho
Writer: Vikram Juthika (dialogue), Hussain Sha Kiran (additional story), Srinivas Rongali (dialogue), Buchi Babu Sana (dialogue), Sukumar (screenplay)
Actors: N.T. Rama Rao Jr., Rakul Preet Singh, Jagapathi Babu, Rajendraprasad
Plot: An intelligent son of a former entrepreneur takes revenge on a powerful and rich businessman who is as smart as he is.
